greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Second differences of sigma(n).
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: -1 - 1/x + (1 - x)^2*Sum_{k>=1} k*x^(k-2)/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 29 2017
program: (MAGMA) [DivisorSigma(1, n+2) - 2*DivisorSigma(1,n+1) + DivisorSigma(1, n): n in [1..100]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Sep 03 2018
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 06 2000
